DOC.brief_summary: This study was designed to evaluate the safety of the investigational Rotavirus Vaccine and the efficacy to prevent Rotavirus Gastroenteritis.
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 10 months.
DOC.criteria: Healthy infants History of abdominal disorders from a birth defect, intussusception, or abdominal surgery Known or suspected problems with immune system Fever at time of immunization Prior administration of a rotavirus vaccine History of known prior rotavirus disease Chronic diarrhea, or failure to thrive
